name.narrative: The expansion of the additional 26 beds of Dal Al Fouad Hospital will be on the campus of the Hospital which is located in the 6th of October City. The Hospital will acquire an existing property in Nasr City Cairo with a view to developing a new facility at that location. The location is excellent being in the heart of a very large residential area with a two main road frontage. The new facility currently only occupies around one third of it.
